component.text:
How to find the verification code on Facebook:

DNS verification: facebook-domain-verification=abcdefghijklmnopqrst0123456789

HTML-File-Upload: http://example.com/abcdefghijklmnopqrst0123456789.html

Metatag verification: < meta name="facebook-domain-verification" content="abcdefghijklmnopqrst0123456789" / >

So finden Sie den Verifizierungs-Code bei Facebook:

DNS-Verifizierung: facebook-domain-verification=abcdefghijklmnopqrst0123456789

HTML-Datei-Upload: http://beispiel.de/abcdefghijklmnopqrst0123456789.html

Metatag-Verifizierung: < meta name="facebook-domain-verification" content="abcdefghijklmnopqrst0123456789" / >
